name: Square Jumper (FlorianMakesGames)
description:
Information

Square Jumper is a Adventure/Jump and Run game where you play as a square who tries to get through a parkour and simply, dont die!

(game isnt finished lol)

this is just a little project on that i worked on, so dont expect something really good lol and better only trust this page, because the engine i used is open-source means, bascially everyone could modify the game.
